title: REWARDS
body: riot i dont have the season rewards why ?? i dont get chat ban or something......

replies.body: No worries, we're happy to look into your specific issue. Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into your rewards eligibility.  Hang tight and we'll reply back as soon as we can!
